creator: EZVIZ Inc.
descriptionHtml:
EZVIZ – Security Video For Smart Life

The EZVIZ app is designed to work with our series of security NVRs, DVRs and cloud cameras. By using this app, it is so easy to manage your camera and other smart home devices remotely from across the globe any time.

You can get full access and remote control of all devices functions at fingertips, and take necessary actions to ensure the safety of your homes, businesses and loved ones when receiving immediate motion detection alerts on your phone.

Key features:
- View high-definition live stream from anywhere
- See in the dark with IR light on
- Playback recorded videos with CloudPlay, an SD card or NVR/DVR
- Talk via Two-Way Audio
- Get instant alerts when motion is detected
- Customize detection zones and sensitivity
- Set schedules to record the moments that matter
- Share devices with friends and family

Contact Us
Technical Support: support@ezvizlife.com
General Enquiries: info@ezvizlife.com
Official Website: https://www.ezvizlife.com/
descriptionShort: The EZVIZ app makes it easy to manage your camera remotely from across the globe

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Support sharing the alarm picture to other Apps
Support sorting device cards of home page
Optimize Playback and support watching playback by fast forward
Support switching At-Home and Home-Away mode quickly
Support saving the device QR code to mobile phone so that you can add device more conveniently
Experiences enhanced

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1.Due to the increasing challenges for our engineering teams to maintain the product on old dated OS versions, we had to make the difficult decision to end releasing App updates for devices running on OS versions lower than Android 5, starting January 1, 2021. Please upgrade your device to Android 5.0 or higher to get the most out of your EZVIZ devices. We apologize for all the inconvenience.
2.bugs fixes

Please upgrade your device to Android 5.0 or higher to get the most out of your EZVIZ devices. We apologize for all the inconvenience.
2.bugs fixes

title: EZVIZ

creator: EZVIZ Inc.
descriptionHtml:
EZVIZ – Security Video For Smart Life

The EZVIZ app is designed to work with our series of security NVRs, DVRs and cloud cameras. By using this app, it is so easy to manage your camera and other smart home devices remotely from across the globe any time.

You can get full access and remote control of all devices functions at fingertips, and take necessary actions to ensure the safety of your homes, businesses and loved ones when receiving immediate motion detection alerts on your phone.

Key features:
- View high-definition live stream from anywhere
- See in the dark with IR light on
- Playback recorded videos with CloudPlay, an SD card or NVR/DVR
- Talk via Two-Way Audio
- Get instant alerts when motion is detected
- Customize detection zones and sensitivity
- Set schedules to record the moments that matter
- Share devices with friends and family

Contact Us
Technical Support: support@ezvizlife.com
General Enquiries: info@ezvizlife.com
Official Website: https://www.ezvizlife.com/
descriptionShort: The EZVIZ app makes it easy to manage your camera remotely from across the globe

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Now we bring out the completely New Update v5.0 of EZVIZ! In this update, we support the followings:
Set devices under Spaces or change the order of each device as you need! The new-designed device cards on homepage let you control devices so easily and quickly.
Updated UI for Library, you can filter events in a simpler way!
Update UI for Shortcuts, Signing in and Creating New Account.
Choose to enable Email alerts of cameras by going to Menu-General Setting-Email Alerts

Please upgrade your device to Android 5.0 or higher to get the most out of your EZVIZ devices. We apologize for all the inconvenience.
2.bugs fixes

title: EZVIZ

creator: EZVIZ Inc.
descriptionHtml:
EZVIZ – Security Video For Smart Life

The EZVIZ app is designed to work with our series of security NVRs, DVRs and cloud cameras. By using this app, it is so easy to manage your camera and other smart home devices remotely from across the globe any time.

You can get full access and remote control of all devices functions at fingertips, and take necessary actions to ensure the safety of your homes, businesses and loved ones when receiving immediate motion detection alerts on your phone.

Key features:
- View high-definition live stream from anywhere
- See in the dark with IR light on
- Playback recorded videos with CloudPlay, an SD card or NVR/DVR
- Talk via Two-Way Audio
- Get instant alerts when motion is detected
- Customize detection zones and sensitivity
- Set schedules to record the moments that matter
- Share devices with friends and family

Contact Us
Technical Support: support@ezvizlife.com
General Enquiries: info@ezvizlife.com
Official Website: https://www.ezvizlife.com/
descriptionShort: The EZVIZ app makes it easy to manage your camera remotely from across the globe

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Now we bring out the completely New Update v5.0 of EZVIZ! In this update, we support the followings:
Set devices under Spaces or change the order of each device as you need! The new-designed device cards on homepage let you control devices so easily and quickly.
Updated UI for Library, you can filter events in a simpler way!
Update UI for Shortcuts, Signing in and Creating New Account.
Choose to enable Email alerts of cameras by going to Menu-General Setting-Email Alerts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1.Per our policy of Global Operations, EZVIZ will establish a data center in India for local storage and processing your personal data, which will be online on 2021-07-20. Please update to this version and log in for further instructions. Non-Indian users would not be impacted.We feel sorry for any incoven
2. Add a new working mode for Battery Camera and improve its configuration process and Notification Schedule
3. Newly support Wi-Fi Signal Detection for battery camera

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this brand new 5.1 version we've updated live view and playback UI. Now the two functions are in the same page. We adopt non-linear timeline to enhance the efficiency of showing history videos. We add a new function called Nearby Device, which allows you to control lights and plugs in the same space while watching live view.
If you would like to know more about our new features, now you can go to Menu(the portraits icon on the up left corner) - New Features.

title: EZVIZ

creator: EZVIZ Inc.
descriptionHtml:
EZVIZ – Security Video For Smart Life

The EZVIZ app is designed to work with our series of security NVRs, DVRs and cloud cameras. By using this app, it is so easy to manage your camera and other smart home devices remotely from across the globe any time.

You can get full access and remote control of all devices functions at fingertips, and take necessary actions to ensure the safety of your homes, businesses and loved ones when receiving immediate motion detection alerts on your phone.

Key features:
- View high-definition live stream from anywhere
- See in the dark with IR light on
- Playback recorded videos with CloudPlay, an SD card or NVR/DVR
- Talk via Two-Way Audio
- Get instant alerts when motion is detected
- Customize detection zones and sensitivity
- Set schedules to record the moments that matter
- Share devices with friends and family

title: EZVIZ

creator: EZVIZ Inc.
descriptionHtml:
EZVIZ – Security Video For Smart Life

The EZVIZ app is designed to work with our series of Security Cameras and other Smart Home products. By using this app, it is so easy to manage your camera and other smart home devices remotely from across the globe any time.

You can get full access and remote control of all devices functions at fingertips, and take necessary actions to ensure the safety of your homes, businesses and loved ones when receiving immediate motion detection alerts on your phone.

Key features:
- View high-definition live stream from anywhere
- See in the dark with IR light on
 - Playback recorded videos with CloudPlay or an SD card
- Talk via Two-Way Audio 
- Get instant alerts when motion is detected
- Customize detection zones and sensitivity 
- Set schedules to record the moments that matter 
- Share devices with friends and family

The EZVIZ app is designed to work with our series of Security Cameras and other Smart Home products. By using this app, it is so easy to manage your camera and other smart home devices remotely from across the globe any time.

You can get full access and remote control of all devices functions at fingertips, and take necessary actions to ensure the safety of your homes, businesses and loved ones when receiving immediate motion detection alerts on your phone.

Key features:
- View high-definition live stream from anywhere
- See in the dark with IR light on
 - Playback recorded videos with CloudPlay or an SD card
- Talk via Two-Way Audio 
- Get instant alerts when motion is detected
- Customize detection zones and sensitivity 
- Set schedules to record the moments that matter 
- Share devices with friends and family 

Contact Us
 Technical Support: support@ezvizlife.com
General Enquiries: info@ezvizlife.com
descriptionShort: The EZVIZ app makes it easy to manage your camera remotely from across the globe

The EZVIZ app is designed to work with our series of Security Cameras and other Smart Home products. By using this app, it is so easy to manage your camera and other smart home devices remotely from across the globe any time.

You can get full access and remote control of all devices functions at fingertips, and take necessary actions to ensure the safety of your homes, businesses and loved ones when receiving immediate motion detection alerts on your phone.

Key features:
- View high-definition live stream from anywhere
- See in the dark with IR light on
 - Playback recorded videos with CloudPlay or an SD card
- Talk via Two-Way Audio 
- Get instant alerts when motion is detected
- Customize detection zones and sensitivity 
- Set schedules to record the moments that matter 
- Share devices with friends and family 

Contact Us
 Technical Support: support@ezvizlife.com
General Enquiries: info@ezvizlife.com
descriptionShort: The EZVIZ app makes it easy to manage your camera remotely from across the globe

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Optimized the experience of live view and event timeline.
2. Optimized the experience of device adding.
3. Supported setting Romanian language in application.
4. Regular daily updates.
